snippet: Most of the big banks had collectively doubled the cushions they hold against losses since the first tests in 2009.
abstract: Federal Reserve chairman Ben S Bernanke says annual stress tests of 18 major American banks show industry is much healthier since financial crisis; notes they collectively doubled cushion they hold against losses since first tests in 2009.
lead_paragraph: Most of the big banks had collectively doubled the cushions they hold against losses since the first tests in 2009.
